verses.content: Hi hnunga Moab thlahai le Ammon thlahai chu, Meunim mi ṭhenkhathai le chun Jehosaphat chu do dingin an hung thaw tah a.

Chun, mi tuhai amanih an hung a, Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Suria rama tuipui râla inthawkin mipui nasatak nangma rûn ding chein an hung a, ngai ta, Hazazon-tamarah an um,” tiin an hril a, (chu chu Engedi leh angkhat a nih).
Chuongchun, Jehosaphat chu a ṭi tah a; LALPA chu a zawng a, Juda ram po poa bunghei a rawt tah a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu LALPA ṭhangpuina zawng dingin an in- khâwm a; Juda ram khawpui po poa inthawkin LALPA chu zawng dingin an hung tâwl a.
Jehosaphat chu LALPA inah, tuollai thar hmaa Juda le Jerusalem mipui pungkhâwmhai laia chun a ngîr a;

A hril a, “Aw LALPA, kan thlatu- hai Pathien, nang chu vân Pathien i ni naw am a nih? Hnamhai lalram po pohai chunga rorêltu chu nang i ni naw am a nih? I kuta chun hrâtna le thilthawtheina a um a, chuleiin, tukhawma dang thei naw ni hai che.
Aw kan Pathien, i mi Israelhai hmaah hi ram hluotuhai hi i hnawt suokin, i ruolpa Abraham thlahai kuomah kumkhuoa dingin i pêk a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, chutaka chun an um a, i ta dingin i hmingin hmun inthieng chutaka chun an bâwlpêk che a,

‘Thil ṭha naw dâm, kâwlhnâm dâm, rorêlna dâm, hri amanih, ṭâm amanih kan chungah a hung tlung chun nangma hmaa le hi in hmaa hin ngîr kan ta, (i hming chu hi ina hin a um sih a,) kan rimsiknaa chun nang hung ko kan ti cheh a, nang chun mi lo sandam i tih,’ tiin.
Tuhin, ngai ta, Ammon le Moab thlahai le Seir tlâng Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia nangin Israel mihai inrûntir lo le, insuk- siettir lo a i în umtirhai khan,
ngai ta, nangin hluo dinga i mi pêk, i chana inthawka hunga mi hnawt suok dinga an mi hung thaw- zie hi lo hre la.

Aw kan Pathien, nangin an chungah ro i rêl ding a ni naw am a nih? Hieng keini mi hung thaw tum pâwl nasatak el chunga hin hrâtna kan nei si nawh a; ieng am thaw ding a na ti khawm kan hriet bawk nawh; nangma tieng kan hung ngha a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Juda mihai po po chu LALPA hmaa chun an nauhai leh an nuhmeihai le an nautêhai rawi le chun an ngîr a.
Chun, Asaph naupasalhai Levi mi, Mattania naupa, Jeiel naupa, Benaia naupa, Zekaria naupa, Jaha- ziel chunga chun mipui inkhâwmhai laia chun LALPA thlarau a hung tlung a;

ama chun a hril a, “Nangni Juda mi po pohai, Jerusalem hluotu po pohai le nang lal Jehosaphat, lo ngai ta u, LALPA chun hieng ang hin in kuomah a ti a nih, ‘Hi mipui tamtak lei hin beidawng naw unla, ṭit khawm ṭi bawk naw ro; indona chu in ta a ni nawh a, Pathien ta a ni lem sih a.
Zînga hin anni chu zuk thaw unla, ngai ta u, Ziz lam tunga khan an hung a nih; Jeruel thlalêr tlung hmaa phairuom tâwpa khan anni chu hmûng in tih.

Hi indonaa hin in do ngai kher naw nih, intlar phawt unla, ngîr ṭawk ṭawk ro; LALPA sandamna chu en zing el ro; aw Juda mihai le Jerusalem mihai, ṭi naw unla, beidawng bawk naw ro; zingah anni chu hang thaw unla, LALPA chu in kuomah a um sih a,’” tiin.
Chun, Jehosaphat chu a hmaia hnuoi sikin a lu a kûn a, chun, Juda mi po po le Jerusalema chêngtuhai chu LALPA hmaa chun an bawkkhup a, LALPA chibai an bûk a.
Chun, Kohath thlahai le Kora thla Levi mihai chu râwl nasataka inringa Israel Pathien LALPA chu inpâk dingin an ngir tah a.

Chun, zîngkâr inhmatakin an tho a, Tekoa thlalêra chun an hang feh a, chun, chuonga an fe suok lai chun Jehosaphat chu a ngîr a, “Aw Juda le Jerusalema chêngtuhai, mi lo ngai ta u; LALPA in Pathien chu ring unla, chuongchun, sukdetin um in tih; a zâwlneihai chu ring unla, chuongchun, hlawtling in tih,” a ta.

Chun, mipuihai chu ân fui zo hnung chun, sipaihai hmaa an fe suok phaa inthieng mawina chu inpâka LALPA kuoma hla sak dingin mi a ruot a: “LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ro, a zângaina chu kumkhuoin a um zing sih a, ti ro” a ta.
Chun, an inpâk a, hla an hang sak ṭan phing chun Juda ram hung rûntuhai Seir tlâng le, Moab le Ammon thlahai chunga chun inchân rutuhai LALPA chun ân chân tir tah a; chuongchun, hnein an um tah a.

Moab le Ammon thlahai chu Seir tlâng khuo deltuhai chu that vawng a, anni sukbohmang dingin an hung tho tah a; chun, Seir tlâng hluotuhai an hung sukrêm hnunga khawm chun, mi tin chu mi dang dang insukbohmangtuo an tum seng tah a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu thlalêra vêngna in insânga an hang tlung chun; mipuihai chu an hei en a; chun, ngai ta, mithi ruong hnuoia tluhai chu an hmu a; tukhawm a damsuok hrim an um dêr nawh a.

Chun, Jehosaphat le a mihai chu an thuom hlîppêk dinga an hung chun lunghluhai, silfênhai, hausakna nasatak elhai chu anni lai chun an hmusuok a, chuonghai chu an phur sêng lo rauin an lâk a; chuong ang lâwm chun a tam a, ni thum sûng zet chu râllâk thilhai chu an lâk a.
Chun, a ni li ni chun anni chu Beraka ruoma chun an inkhâwm a, chutaka chun LALPA chu an chawi- mawi a, chuleiin, a hmun hming chu tu chen hin “Malsâwmna ruom” ti a ni tah a.

Chun, Juda rama mi po po le Jerusalema mihai chu an kîr nâwk tah a; Jehosaphat chu anni rawi hmaa chun hlimtakin Jerusalema fe ding chun a kîr tah a; LALPA chun an hmêlmahai chunga hlim dingin anni chu a lo siem ta sih a.
Chun, Jerusalema chun LALPA inah perkhuonghai, ṭingṭanghai, taw- tawrâwthai leh an hung lût a.
Chun, Israelhai hmêlmahai chu LALPA chun a dopui ti an hriet chun chuong ramhaia lalramhai po po chunga chun LALPA ṭina chu a um a.
Chuongchun, Jehosaphat ram huop sûng chu a re ṭawk ṭawk a; a Pathien chun a vêl po poa chun râl- muongna a pêk sih a.
Jehosaphat chun Juda ram chunga chun ro a rêl a, a rorêl ṭan chun kum sâwmthum panga a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmhni panga a rêl a; a nu hming chu Azuba, Silhi naunu kha a nih.
A pa Asa lampui kha a hraw a, LALPA mithmua ân dik chu thawin a pêtsan ngai nawh a.
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu lâk hmang a ni nawh a; mihai khawm chun an thlatuhai Pathien tienga chun an lungrilhai an lân nghat chie nawh a.
Jehosaphat thilthaw, a hmasa le a nuhnunghai chu, ngai ta, Hanani naupa Jehu chanchin bu, Israel lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a nih.
Chun, hi hnunga hin Juda ram lal Jehosaphat chu Israel ram lal Ahazia le chun an inzawm a; ama chun khawhlotakin a thawh a;
lawnghai siema, Tarsisa fe dingin ama chu ân zawmpui a; chuong chun, Ezion-gebera chun lawnghai chu an siem tah a.

Chun, Maresaa Dodavahu naupa Eliezer chun Jehosaphat chunga chun a hrillâwk a, “Ahazia chu în zawmpui leiin, LALPA chun i sinthawhai chu a suksiet tah,” a ta. Chuongchun, lawnghai chu an kawiseh a, Tarsisa chun an fe thei ta nawh a.
